description:
Stores 2 full size SD cards or SD/microSD card adapters and 4 microSD cards or 6 microSD cards if SD/ microSD adapters (not supplied) are used. Durable memory card holder slips comfortably into wallet, purse or pocket. Store up to 768 Gigabytes depending on the size of your memory cards. Memory cards are held firmly in place, optionally attach to lanyard (not supplied). Ideal for use with SD and microSD compatible mobile phones, tablet PC's, cameras, camcorders, games consoles, etc. Allows you to keep all your photo's, videos, movies, emails with you off-line. No need to leave pictures or valuable data in your camera, phone or PC, carry it with you on-person. Card holder body made in one piece moulded ABS plastic.

Sprung detent positively locks cards in place.

Ultrathin microSD card holder also available - search DIMECARD on Amazon.
title: DiMeCard-SD: SD + microSD Memory Card Holder (credit card size holder, writable label)
